mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OFFER( OFFER_CODE, OFFER_PRODUCT, OFFER_START, OFFER_RENTAL, OFFER_PICKUP, OFFER_PRICE, OFFER_DATE, OFFER_WASH, OFFER_PREMIUM, STORAGE_CODE, COUPON_CODE, STORE_CODE, LAUNDRY_PRODUCT, OFFER_PAY, MEMBER_ID, OFFER_ADDR ) VALUES ( OF_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{offer_product}, #{offer_start}, #{offer_rental}, #{offer_pickup}, #{offer_price}, #{offer_date}, #{offer_wash}, #{offer_premium}, #{storage_code}, #{coupon_code}, #{store_code}, #{laundry_product}, 'N', #{member_id}, #{offer_addr} )
